rule.comment: This file is used as an exception mechanism to remove common false positives that may be encountered. Exception for Apache SSL pinger
Exception for Apache internal dummy connection
Alert and Deny on High Anomaly Scores

rule.operator:
Site Error<\/h2>.{0,20}

An error was encountered while publishing this resource\.
rule.comment: Zope Information Leakage
